name: MADFUT 23
description:
The new generation of MADFUT app is here, and it's the best one yet. Welcome to the new '23 season, with more amazing content and modes than ever before!

Huge additions in MADFUT 23:
• Tokens
• Online Cups
• Daily Levels challenges
• Improved sim logic and new actions
• And much more!

Improved modes and features you already know and love:
• Build squads
• Play Fatal modes
• Complete challenges and objectives
• Complete DOTD and other daily challenges

And as always, there will be new content all the time. Many new modes, features, and major events are coming throughout the year!
